references.title: Die Feldgleichungen der Gravitation (The Field Equations of Gravitation)
references.journal: Sitzungsberichte der Preussischen Akademie der Wissenschaften zu Berlin

references.title: Die Grundlagen der Physik (The Foundations of Physics)
references.journal: Nachrichten von der Gesellschaft der Wissenschaften zu Gottingen

references.authors: Sethi, S., Vafa, C., Witten, E.
references.title: Constraints on low-dimensional string compactifications
references.notes: This is the paper that derives the generation formula n_gen = χ/24 for F-theory compactifications on Calabi-Yau fourfolds using the D3-brane index theorem.

references.title: Gauge Symmetry in Phase Space, Consequences for Physics and Spacetime
references.journal: International Journal of Modern Physics A
references.notes: Core reference for Sp(2,R) gauge symmetry in two-time physics. The three constraints X²=0, X·P=0, P²+M²=0 eliminate ghosts from the second time dimension. Note: references.html has bars2008 (arXiv:0807.5006) which is a later review paper.

references.title: Statistical-Mechanical Theory of Irreversible Processes. I.
references.journal: Journal of the Physical Society of Japan
references.notes: KMS condition reference exists in HTML as 'kms1957', but combines Kubo, Martin, and Schwinger citations.

references.title: Theory of Many-Particle Systems. I.
references.notes: Part of KMS condition development, combined with Kubo 1957 in references.html.

references.title: On Canonical Forms of von Neumann Algebras
references.journal: Fifth Functional Analysis Symposium, Tohoku University
references.notes: Tomita exists in HTML, but Takesaki 1970 is missing as separate entry.

references.title: Tomita's Theory of Modular Hilbert Algebras and its Applications
references.notes: Second part of Tomita-Takesaki theory, currently missing from references.html.

references.title: Pomeron form factors and dual Regge cuts
references.notes: First calculation showing D=26 critical dimension for bosonic string from Virasoro anomaly cancellation.

references.title: μ → eγ at a Rate of One Out of 10⁹ Muon Decays?
references.notes: Exists in HTML as 'seesaw', but combines multiple authors (Minkowski, Yanagida, Gell-Mann et al., Mohapatra-Senjanovic).

references.authors: Gell-Mann, M., Ramond, P., Slansky, R.
references.title: Complex Spinors and Unified Theories
references.notes: Part of seesaw mechanism development, combined in HTML as 'seesaw'.

references.title: Conservation of Isotopic Spin and Isotopic Gauge Invariance
Zum Unitatsproblem der Physik (On the Unification Problem of Physics)
references.journal: Sitzungsberichte der Preussischen Akademie der Wissenschaften

orphaned_references.title: Gravitation
orphaned_references.authors: Misner, C.W., Thorne, K.S., Wheeler, J.A.
orphaned_references.notes: Textbook reference, not directly cited by any formula but provides foundational material on differential geometry and general relativity.

orphaned_references.title: The Quantum Theory of the Electron
orphaned_references.notes: Foundational spinor/Dirac equation reference, not directly cited but underpins fermion formalism.

orphaned_references.title: An Introduction to Quantum Field Theory
orphaned_references.notes: Textbook reference for QFT, not directly cited by formulas.

orphaned_references.title: Compact Manifolds with Special Holonomy
orphaned_references.notes: Definitive text on G₂ geometry, provides theoretical foundation but not directly cited in formula attributions.

orphaned_references.title: Metrics with Exceptional Holonomy
orphaned_references.notes: First construction of G₂ metrics, foundational but not directly cited.

orphaned_references.title: Twisted connected sums and special Riemannian holonomy
orphaned_references.notes: TCS construction methodology, foundational for PM's G₂ manifolds but not directly cited in formulas.

orphaned_references.title: Calabi's Conjecture and Some New Results in Algebraic Geometry
orphaned_references.notes: Calabi-Yau manifolds, pedagogical context but PM uses G₂ manifolds.

orphaned_references.title: Geometry, Topology and Physics
orphaned_references.notes: Textbook on differential geometry and fiber bundles.

orphaned_references.title: The Index of Elliptic Operators on Compact Manifolds
orphaned_references.notes: Atiyah-Singer index theorem, foundational for understanding topology/physics connection.

orphaned_references.title: M Theory, Joyce Orbifolds and Super Yang-Mills
orphaned_references.notes: M-theory on G₂ manifolds with gauge group derivation.

orphaned_references.title: G-flux, topology, and the effective action for M-theory moduli
orphaned_references.authors: Acharya, B.S., Kerr, M., Rauh, N., Zimet, M.

orphaned_references.title: M-Theory Dynamics On A Manifold Of G₂ Holonomy
Vacuum Configurations for Superstrings
orphaned_references.authors: Candelas, P., Horowitz, G., Strominger, A., Witten, E.

orphaned_references.title: Evidence for F-Theory
G₂-manifolds and associative submanifolds via semi-Fano 3-folds
orphaned_references.authors: Corti, A., Haskins, M., Nordström, J., Pacini, T.

orphaned_references.title: The Landscape of M-theory Compactifications on Seven-Manifolds with G₂ Holonomy
Machine Learning the Tetrad Index on TCS G₂ Manifolds
orphaned_references.notes: Recent computational work on TCS manifolds.

orphaned_references.title: Gauge Symmetry in Phase Space: Consequences for Physics and Spacetime
orphaned_references.notes: Later review paper (2008, arXiv:0807.5006), not the 2006 original cited in formulas.
